lead_paragraph: A version of Shamoon, the virus that hit Middle Eastern energy companies in 2012, was used in mid-November to attack government agencies.

byline.contributor: Thomas Erdbrink and Nour Youssef contributed reporting.

headline.main: Cyberattacks Strike Saudi Arabia, Harming Aviation Agency
